name: projman
displayName: Projman - Project Management for Claude Code
description: Sprint planning and project management with Gitea and Wiki.js integration. Provides AI-guided sprint planning, issue creation with label taxonomy, and lessons learned capture.
author: Hyper Hive Labs

commands.name: sprint-plan
commands.title: Plan Sprint
commands.description: Start sprint planning with AI-guided architecture analysis and issue creation

commands.name: sprint-start
commands.title: Start Sprint
commands.description: Begin sprint execution with relevant lessons learned from previous sprints

commands.name: sprint-status
commands.title: Sprint Status
commands.description: Check current sprint progress and identify blockers

commands.name: sprint-close
commands.title: Close Sprint
commands.description: Complete sprint and capture lessons learned to Wiki.js

commands.name: labels-sync
commands.title: Sync Label Taxonomy
commands.description: Synchronize label taxonomy from Gitea and update suggestion logic

agents.name: planner
agents.title: Sprint Planner Agent
agents.description: Performs architecture analysis, asks clarifying questions, and creates detailed planning documents

agents.name: orchestrator
agents.title: Sprint Orchestrator Agent
agents.description: Coordinates sprint execution, generates lean prompts, and tracks progress

agents.name: executor
agents.title: Implementation Executor Agent
agents.description: Provides implementation guidance and code review following architectural decisions

skills.name: label-taxonomy
skills.title: Label Taxonomy Reference
skills.description: Dynamic reference for Gitea label taxonomy (organization + repository labels)
